name: Red & Blue Cosmic Adventures Against Dark Flaming Space Eyes: The Game
name_original: Red & Blue Cosmic Adventures Against Dark Flaming Space Eyes: The Game
description:
Join Red and Blue on a space journey, dodging the Dark Flaming Space Eyes and collect as many energy spheres as you can! 

Control both spheres at the same time and be quick to dodge monsters that will advance towards you.

Comments and feedbacks are most welcome!
